txt.en: You have held off the wolves and lynxes and should return to Ivoreth at her camp in the Angle of Mitheithel to see how she fares.
Return to Ivoreth at her camp
Wolves and lynxes threaten the safety of Ivoreth and Barhador. They can be found on the hill just north of their camp in the Angle of Mitheithel.
'Thank you, [placeholder] for buying us some time. I will not forget your kindness. We are almost ready to go on our way.'
Ivoreth has realized that they are not safe at her chosen camp, and has asked you to stave off the wolves and lynxes that lurk nearby while she and Barhador prepare to depart.

'Oh, [placeholder]... I fear I have chosen a terrible place to rest! There are wolves and lynxes all about us! I really should have known better. Please, if you are truly a friend, would you stave them off while I put away the food and get Barhador ready to travel once more? I am competent with a blade and will keep watch here as I can while we make ready.\n\n'I saw them there, up this hill to the north of us.'
